name: Awesome Ludum Boat Race
description:
Not much there to say, grab your friends and go for a boat ride!

This game is primarily meant to be played split-screen with up to 3 other people, but you can also play by yourself and see how fast you are.

The controls are simple. You swing your left and right paddle using A and D on the keyboard if you play solo. With more players, the game will tell you.

This game was created as part of Ludum Dare 47 game jam.
